column5: Updated home in a great neighborhood! Lovely covered backyard patio with plenty of seating! Fully stocked kitchen, amazing bathroom, Roku TV with Netflix, Hulu, etc.   Only 10-15 mins from downtown, the zoo, TCU, Magnolia area, 7th street, or cultural district. Only 1/2 a mile from the Trinity Trail for a walk or bike ride.
column8: Clean Artsy Home in Cozy Neighborhood
